data.text:
Crown Wars: The Black Prince is a medieval fantasy strategy RPG developed by Artefacts Studio and published by Nacon! Read on to learn about its release date, its price, and its target platforms.

Crown Wars: The Black Prince Release Date and Time

Released on May 23, 2024!

Crown Wars: The Black Prince came out for the PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S on May 23, 2024! Steam page states it came out on May 23 12 p.m. EDT / 9 a.m. PDT, whereas the PlayStation store listed it on May 23 at 4 a.m. EDT / 1 a.m. PDT. Look to the tables below for your region’s corresponding release times!

PC/Steam Release Time

Region Local Release Time United States (EDT) May 23, 12:00 p.m. United States (PDT) May 23, 9:00 a.m. United Kingdom May 23, 5:00 p.m. New Zealand May 24, 5:00 a.m. Australian East Coast May 24, 3:00 a.m. Australian West Coast May 24, 12:00 a.m. Japan May 24, 1:00 a.m. Philippines May 24, 12:00 a.m. South Africa May 23, 6:00 p.m. Brazil May 23, 1:00 p.m.

PlayStation Release Time

Region Local Release Time United States (EDT) May 23, 4:00 a.m. United States (PDT) May 23, 1:00 a.m. United Kingdom May 23, 9:00 a.m. New Zealand May 23, 9:00 p.m. Australian East Coast May 23, 7:00 p.m. Australian West Coast May 23, 4:00 p.m. Japan May 23, 5:00 p.m. Philippines May 23, 4:00 p.m. South Africa May 23, 10:00 a.m. Brazil May 23, 5:00 a.m.

Crown Wars: The Black Prince Pre-Orders

Crown Wars: The Black Prince can be purchased on Steam for $39.99, while costing $49.99 on the PlayStation and Xbox Store.

Pre-ordering will net early buyers the following:

⚫︎ Blood Pact Weapon Skins DLC

Digital Storefronts Steam PlayStation Xbox $39.99 $49.99

The Crown Wars - Sacred Edition costs $49.99 on Steam, and costs $59.99 on the PlayStation and Xbox store. Besides the base game, it will contain the following extra content and bonuses:

⚫︎ Digital Artbook

⚫︎ Digital Soundtrack

⚫︎ Digial Strategy Guide

⚫︎ Brotherhood of Light Cosmetic Pack

Digital Storefronts Steam PlayStation Xbox $49.99 $59.99

Is Crown Wars: The Black Prince on Xbox Game Pass?

It has yet to be announced whether the game will be available on Xbox Game Pass.

Is Crown Wars: The Black Prince on PS Plus?

It’s currently unknown whether the game will become available for PS Plus.
